page.title: 19 Adstock Manor
page.content: The manor has 200 acres of fields and keeps a small herd of cows for fattening for market.There is also a pig run for 2 pigs,3 chickens runs for 20 chickens,2 gundogs kennels & 5 ducks.Other out buildings,2 sheds,being converted into garages on the ground floor & chicken run on the first floor, a wood store,newly built secretarys cottages.Also there is; a water pump dating from 1847,a greenhouse, coldframe,a large vegetable garden, a small apple orchard,a garden pond fed by a stream coming from Adstock,a ha ha,a small baffle noise from the A413 & a two year old tennis court.There is a fulltime gardener.There are also strawberry field in the area called Gravel pits.
